==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|こう|せつ|yomi=on}}

===Etymology===
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=こうせつ}} compound {{m|zh|交接|tr=kæw tsjep|lit=mix + connect}}.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=o|こうせつ|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|こうせつ|hhira=かうせつ}}

# [[social]] [[connection]]s, [[contact]] with other people, a [[relationship]], [[relations]]
# [[sex]], [[sexual intercourse]], [[coitus]], [[copulation]]

====Synonyms====
* {{sense|social connections}} {{ja-r|交際|こうさい}}, {{ja-r|付き合い|つきあい}}
* {{sense|sex}} {{ja-r|性交|せいこう}} {{qualifier|humans}}, {{ja-r|交尾|こうび}} {{qualifier|animals}}

====Usage notes====
In reference to sex, ''kōsetsu'' is a somewhat [[dry]] and [[indirect]] term, similar to English {{m|en|sexual relations|(sexual) relations}}.

===Verb===
{{ja-verb-suru|こうせつ|hhira=かうせつ}}

# to have [[social]] [[connection]]s, to have a [[relationship]]
# to have [[sexual intercourse]], to [[copulate]]

====Conjugation====
{{ja-suru|こうせつ}}

====Synonyms====
* {{sense|to have social connections}} {{ja-r|交際|こうさい}}, {{ja-r|付き合い|つきあい}}
* {{sense|to have sexual intercourse}} {{ja-r|性交|せいこう}} {{qualifier|humans}}, {{ja-r|交尾|こうび}} {{qualifier|animals}}
